name: golden island ltd
goal:
We are a beekeeping company based in malta involved in managing a number of apiaries for the production of honey and other quality beehive products
We are interested in promoting beekeeping and its importance with the general public and have participated in various research projects to promote the quality and importance of honey
We would like to be able to make a pdo for honey and improve local honey standards and its production
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Education, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: we have benefited from various eu and national funding for research and innovation
